item.title: HUK Men’s Next Level Quick-Drying Performance Fishing Shorts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The Huk Next Level 10.5″ Short: Any day is a good day when you get to wear shorts. These start out as a classic button, zip fly, 2 front pocket, 2 rear zip pocket, 1 cargo short, but that where normal stops. This classic 10.5″ short is super-comfortable and has ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:26 UTC – Details)


The Huk Next Level 10.5″ Short: Any day is a good day when you get to wear shorts. These start out as a classic button, zip fly, 2 front pocket, 2 rear zip pocket, 1 cargo short, but that where normal stops. This classic 10.5″ short is super-comfortable and has a ton of tech and performance built in them. Huk uses a lightweight, quick dry, UPF +30 stretch fabric gusseted crotch to keep your mobility at a premium. Rear yoke includes laser perforation to further enhance the quick dry / breathability of these shorts. Lastly, Huk added an adjustable waistband for a perfect fit. On the boat, dock or just hanging around town, these will make your day a little better and always have you at the ready to fish. At Huk, we unite all anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8 x 8 x 2 inches; 8 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ H2000011
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 24, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Huk
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07GSYZY98

Imported
Button closure
Machine Wash
Huk | Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish
NEXT LEVEL 10.5″ SHORT – This fishing short protects your skin from the sun’s harmful rays and is quick drying ensuring all day comfort | 10.5″ length falls at the knee
TECHNICAL PERFORMANCE FISH SHORT – The Next Level incorporates perforated back yoke, zippered back pocket, plyer and cargo pockets and gusseted crotch for maximum mobility; you’ll never want to fish without this fully featured short again

4.5
Price: $32.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:26 UTC – Details)
